channel.title: The Brohio Podcast
channel.description: Two Bros cover all of the mysteries of the universe. Paranormal, Aliens, Conspiracies, Cryptozoology, Famous Murders, Urban Legends, Monsters, Demons, Occult and Strange Occurrences. Nothing is off limits. The Bros are driven by crude humor and the ability to laugh at everything. If you flirt with the dark side of humor and lack maturity, this podcast could potentially change your life. item.title: Wineville Chicken Coop Murders
item.description: Gordon Northcutt was a canadian chicken rancher living in Southern California. He was shunned from LA for sexual assault allegations cast against him. He hired the help of nephew, Sanford, where they ultimately committed the murder of as many as 20 boys at the chicken ranch. One of the missing boys was Walter Collins. His disappearance alone was enough for it's own episode.

Cheryl Pierson-Cuccio grew up in Long Island, New York. At a very young age, she was forced to keep a very dark secret. Eventually the burden of being a victim her entire life became too much. Cheryl and her future husband, Rob Cuccio, hashed a plan to kill her father for the atrocities he'd committed against her for her entire life. Cheryl has since written a book, Incest, Murder and a Miracle: The True Story Behind the Cheryl Pierson Murder-For-Hire Headlines and the power of love, to share her struggles and tell her own story. Cheryl is a fighter, an inspiration and her love story with her husband is one for the ages.

Link to her book:
https://www.amazon.com/Incest-Murder-Miracle-Murder-Hire-ebook/dp/B01N3SZFE5

You can find Cheryl on Facebook: Cheryl Cuccio

item.title: The Mad Gasser Attacks
item.description:
In the 1930’s and the 1940’s, mass hysteria reached an all time high in Mattoon, Illinois, when an unknown being or entity was believed to be breaking into homes and carrying out gas attacks. This gas was so debilitating, victims were rendered paralyzed when they came into contact with the gas. Although the Mad Gasser of Mattoon was never captured, we believe we might have the answer to who or what carried out the attacks.

SPONSORS

item.title: List Family Murders: A Perfect Murder
item.description: John List was a quiet, awkward, religious man just trying to make ends meet. He was a decorated war veteran with a hidden dark side. John List was pushed to the point where he had to weigh whether his family was better off on earth or in heaven. Unfortunately for them, he didn't chose earth. Nearly pulling off the perfect murder.

item.title: The Untold Story: The Assassination of Abraham Lincoln
item.description:
Many people are unaware that the story we're told of the death of our beloved 16th president, Abraham Lincoln, leave out many facts and strange coincidences. The belief that one single man, John Wilkes Booth, carried this deed out all on his own is just not true. In this episode we review all the conspiracies linked to Lincoln's death. We also review the truths behind the story that Booth wasn't killed when the government said he was.

***SPONSORS***

item.title: Dark Vault: Eisenhower's Meetings with the Aliens Special Guest Laura Eisenhower
item.description:
In this Dark Vault Episode, we dive deep into the alleged meeting between President Dwight Eisenhower and the aliens. This was an attempt to sign a treaty to stop humans from destroying the earth. We are joined by Dwight Eisenhower's great granddaughter, where we discuss everything from this alien meeting, to the deep state child ring popular in the news right now.

item.title: Dark Vault: Dream Surveys and The Payphones From Hell
item.description:
This is undoubtedly one of the deepest dives we've ever gone on. We speak with Bob, owner of the youtube channel "Tales From The Dark". Bob is what we'll call a "darkness investigator". Bob is currently in an investigation that is linking a world wide dream survey with the Futel "payphone project". There are so many clues connecting this wild ride, including the possibility that these "Payphones" are possibly part. Of the I-75 sex trade corridor. There is also a link between these dream Surveys and an apocalypse scenario scheduled for Sept 5th of 2020. This is a profound investigation that will leave you dumbfounded.

Bobs Channel "Tales From The Dark"
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpnzhRSRUdl9Dx2I1da8GwQ

item.title: The Abduction and Seduction of Antonio Vilas Boas
item.description:
A lot of people talk about the Roswell Crash being the first mega UFO incident, but the inaccurate reportings of the Roswell Crash weren’t really brought to the public attention until the 1970’s nearly 30 years after the crash. Antonio Vilas Boas' abduction takes us to Brazil in 1957.
Many researchers say this specific incident is the first recorded incident of a UFO abduction in the modern age. Antonio claims he was abducted and forced to have sex with an ET. We share his story.

item.title: Free Britney
item.description:
Britney Spears is a generational icon unlike anything we've ever seen. Every 30-something year old in the world has a soft spot for the "Princess of Pop". Recently, there has been a movement, the #freebritney movement, which aims to break the chains of the conservatorship that has held her hostage for the past decade. Her Father, Jaime Spears, controls every aspect of Britney's life. She can't vote, drive and doesn't even have access to her own money. Britney can't even leave the house legally without his permission. Also, we explore the possibility of Britney being a slave, or "monarch" in the Project MKUltra program.

item.title: Dark Vault: Dead President In The Front Seat
item.description:
In this episode of The Dark Vault, we are joined by a former guest, Senior Scientist Raymond Szymanski. While Ray is an expert in the area of UFOS and ETs, he provides us with a very strange story where a dead president was riding shotgun with him on a long car ride.

Ray is a published author, with millions of hours of research. You can find his website here: https://itsaufo.wixsite.com/rayszymanski

Cover Art of this episode, credit goes to: Raymond Szymanksi

item.title: Dark Vault: The Demon In The Diner
item.description:
The Brohio Dark Vault has been opened. In this first episode, we speak with a guest who grew up in a diner/apartment that was consumed by an unknown paranormal/demonic force. Katie experienced inanimate objects levitating and flying through the home, red, piercing eyes that visited her during the witching hour, black figures and spirits that stalked her at night and a man in a hat that appeared right before her eyes. The dark force consumed this home and Katie has lived through the terrors and shares her experiences.

Check out Isaac's Art Channel on Instagram!!!: https://www.instagram.com/isaac_prior_art/?hl=en

Have a story for the Brohio Dark Vault?: brohiopodcast@gmail.com subject: "dark vault"

item.title: Wayfair Cabinets, Pizzagate and The Child Trade
item.description:
The latest rager going on in the media is the accusations that Wayfair is trafficking humans in their cabinets. Conspiracies are circulating that missing women and children are being placed in industrial cabinets and sold across the United States. Many people are investigating the links between the alleged Wayfair scandal and the details in the infamous Pizzagate scandal. We also use this episode to bring awareness to the child sex trade that is unfolding all over the country.

item.title: Katherine Knight: The Australian Boyfriend Eater
item.description:
Katherine Knight grew up in a very rough household. She lacked the love and nurturing that a child deserved. She was known as a drunken abuser when she grew up. Often times abusing her husbands with weapons and even caving one of their skulls. It's what happened to her last husband, John Price, that has us so interested. Enjoy this Australian catastrophe.

Check out The It List Podcast

item.title: Moon Landing Hoax
item.description:
Millions of people all around the world believe the monumental walk Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin made on the moon was a giant hoax by the US Government. We were in a space race with Russia, and many believe the moon landing was just a movie shot in the back lot of a movie studio.

This episode was sponsored by Brennan Heath

item.title: Interview with Tony Rodrigues: Secret Space Program Participant
item.description: This is the second part of our episode(s) covering the 20 and Back Secret Space Program. In this episode we are joined by secret space program participant, Tony Rodrigues. Tony was abducted at a young age, subjected to trauma based training, sold as a sex slave and eventually worked on Mars and the moon as a slave. Tony's story is remarkable and we are proud to have him as a guest.

item.description:
The SS Ourang Medan was a Dutch Freighter that sent out a bone chilling distress call in the late 1940's, "*We float. All officers including the captain, dead in chartroom and on the bridge. item.title: Pine Gap: Secret Government Facility
item.description:
Near Alice Springs, Australia, is a secret US Government ran base tucked away in the hills. Pine Gap Defence Facility is shrouded in mystery. Australian and US Governments claim it is used to monitor satellite signals and protect from enemy threats. Edward Snowden said in his giant NSA leak, this facility is used in a large scale, data monitoring operation ran by the US Government. Literally thousands of UFO and abduction stories also start from Pine Gap. Hold on tight.

item.title: Zanesville Zoo Massacre
item.description:
The wildly popular Netflix Series, Tiger King, has exploded and brought back the disgraced memories of a Zanesville, Ohio tragedy. In 2011, exotic animal owner, Terry Thompson, released 50 of his 56 exotic animals into the public. What ensued was public pandemonium and a race by local law enforcement to save the community from these bears, lions, jaguars, tigers, monkey and wolves.

item.title: Charles "Chuck" Morgan: The Most Mysterious Murder You'll Ever Hear
item.description:
Ok, this is a wild one. Charles "Chuck" Morgan disappeared one day, only to show up a couple days later covered in zip ties with a substance on his throat that would cause him to die if he talked..... It only gets weirder when his ties to the mafia and federal government are brought to light.

We also feature an interview with an investigator that blew the whole case wide open, Don Devereux.

item.title: Dementia
item.description: This is pretty big shift from our normal episode. This is Nick doing an entire episode with his Wife's Grandfather. Joe is 96 years old and served in WW2. He suffered a fall a few months back that left him with a severe case of dementia, Joe is still very much in the moment, but his memory is quite foggy, to say the least. This is a heartfelt tribute to Joe.

item.title: Project Stargate: Creating America's Psychic Soldier
item.description:
We take a deep dive into the, now, declassified CIA: Project Stargate.  The US Government conducted many experiments into psychokenesis, remote viewing and many other paranormal research based experiments.  The breakthroughs were incredible and many people benefited from these Government Psychics.  Join us as we take the deep dive.

item.title: Secrets of Wright-Patterson Air Force Base w/ Retired Senior Scientist Raymond Szymanski
item.description:
In this candid interview, we sat down with author and retired senior scientist, Raymond Szymanski.  Ray spent nearly 40 years employed at Wright Patterson Air Force Base and has has traveled the world researching UFO and extraterrestrial phenomena.  Ray is familiar with many of the secrets contained inside the deepest corners of Wright Patterson.  Wright Patterson is home to Project Blue Book and the alleged home of the Roswell wreckage.  He is also the author of Alien Shades of Greys: Evidence of Extraterrestrial Visitation to Wright-Patterson Air Force Base and Beyond and Alien Shades of Greys: Victoria's Secret Truth
Link to Ray's book: https://www.amazon.com/Alien-Shades-Greys-Extraterrestrial-Wright-Patterson/dp/1686377592
Use the promo code "brohio" for your free shipment of Blue Chew at Bluechew.com

In this candid interview, we sat down with author and retired senior scientist, Raymond Szymanski.  Ray spent nearly 40 years employed at Wright Patterson Air Force Base and has has traveled the world researching UFO and extraterrestrial phenomena.  Ray is familiar with many of the secrets contained inside the deepest corners of Wright Patterson.  Wright Patterson is home to Project Blue Book and the alleged home of the Roswell wreckage.  He is also the author of Alien Shades of Greys: Evidence of Extraterrestrial Visitation to Wright-Patterson Air Force Base and Beyond and Alien Shades of Greys: Victoria's Secret Truth
Link to Ray's book: https://www.amazon.com/Alien-Shades-Greys-Extraterrestrial-Wright-Patterson/dp/1686377592
Use the promo code "brohio" for your free shipment of Blue Chew at Bluechew.com

item.title: Black Market Organ Harvesting
item.description:
1 out of 10 organs used in organ transplants are obtained via the Black Market.  It is a dark, winding road that many have to deal with to obtain the organs they need so desperately.  On the flip side, there are the ones you've heard of that wake up in Vegas, in and cold bath, wondering about the new found incision on their back side.  Rob and Nick are here to fill you in on this.  We also touch on the Biological Research Center in Phoenix Arizona.
Support Us: Patreon.com/brohiopodcast
Merch:  brohiopodcast.threadless.com
Our Sponsor!!!:  bluechew.com  PROMO CODE: "BROHIO"

item.title: The Washington DC Beltway Sniper
item.description:
John Muhammad and John (Lee Boyd) Malvo went on a murderous rampage that would grip the entire country in fear. Working out of a homemade, mobile sniper unit, they killed 10 people in the matter of days in the Washington DC area.  The murders forever changed the area and the lives of many. 
Support us: patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: The Cannibal Cop featuring Interview w/ (Suspect) Gil Valle
item.description:
It is very seldom that we are able to land an interview with the main subject of our episode, but this episode was different!  This is the story behind convicted and exonerated Gilberto Valle, The Cannibal Cop.  Gil made it to the headlines when his internet role-playing caused his wife to leave him and contact the FBI.  This is his story of being arrested, convicted and having his conviction overturned.

item.title: Fred and Rosemary West: England's Most Prolific Serial Killing Couple
item.description:
Fred and Rosemary West were the worst of the worst.  they were worse than worse.  These were 2 of the biggest turd balls we've ever covered.  The couple murdered dozens of teenage girls, all while sexually abusing and impregnating the children they had at home.  They ran a brothel out of their home, where Rosemary and some of the children would be pimped out.  Fred made holes in the sex room so he could watch his wife get plugged by these random men that passed through.  This story is a mess.  We hope you like it.
 
Support Us:  Patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: The Smurl Haunting/Southend Werewolf: A Tribute to Lorraine Warren
item.description:
We tag team this episode as we bring you TWO different stories.  We cover the Smurl Family Haunting where multiple demons infest a home in Pennsylvania.  Jack and Janet eventually reached the point where they had to enlist the help of the Catholic Church and famed paranormal investigators, Ed and Lorraine Warren. 
Also, we cover Ole Bill Ramsey.  A man that was possessed by a werewolf demon in Southend, England.  He eventually flew to America where he could enlist the help of Ed and Lorraine for an exorcism.
Check out our sponsor!!  Bluechew.com  Use the promo code "BROHIO" for your free sample!!

item.title: Loomis Fargo Heist: The True Story Behind Masterminds
item.description:
This is one of the most incredible sister kissin', cousin humpin', velvet Elvis good stories we've ever told.  In October of 1997, the second largest cash heist in America history was pulled off by the most unsuspecting hillbillies you could imagine.  David Ghantt used his postion at the Loomis Fargo Armored Truck Company to steal $17.5 million dollars.  Assisting him was his crush, Kelly Campbell and local crook, Steve Chambers.  
Sponsored by Cody Owen.
Get your own episode and support us:  patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: The High Heel Slayer: Jerome Brudos
item.description:
The foot fetish killer, the high heel slayer, a disgusting excuse for a human.  Jerome "Jerry" Brudos was responsible for the torture and death of many innocent females.  Jerry was unloved as a child and had a mother that hated him.  His foot fetish started at a very young age and progressed to many murders.  In this episode we interview Sharon Wood.  Sharon was the target of one of Jerry's abductions and fought to get away.  She comes on our show to tell her story of that day she will never forget in 1968.  Hold on tight!!
 
patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: Turnbull Canyon
item.description:
In Whittier. California a canyon so haunted and evil the locals don't dare go near it.  Turnbull Canyon is home to satanic cults, ghosts, demons, gravity hills and the rumored former location of an insane asylum.  Many people have experienced unspeakable dread in this canyon and the bros are here to tell you all about it.
Support us:  patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: Dulce Base: Nightmare Hall
item.description:
This is the tale of how our wonderful government KNEW without a shadow of a doubt that there was strange aircraft visiting Dulce, New Mexico and Kirtland Air Force Base of New Mexico.  This coupled with HUNDREDS of cattle mutilations and hours upon hours of video surveillance, the Air Force and FBI knew their hands were tied.  So what did they do?  They began to spread misinformation and feed UFO theorists with extreme stories of aliens and UFOs to hide what was really going on!!  This is one of the heaviest alien conspiracies we've ever got our hands on and we couldn't be more excited to share this with you!!
Support Us and get your shoutout!!  patreon.com/brohiopodcast
SPONSORS!!! bluechew.com Promo code: "BROHIO" for your free sample
Much research and excerpts used from: http://www1.american.edu/salla/Articles/Dulc-Rep.htm

item.title: The Las Vegas Shooting: Mandalay Bay
item.description:
In a massacre that is still fresh in the mind of many Americans, the narrative for this story changes daily.  The FBI and Las Vegas Metro Police have constantly changed their stories and many things don't add up for this senseless act.  We will forever think about the ones that will have to deal with the actions of this murderer(s) committed at the Mandalay Bay, Route 91 Festival on Oct 1 2017.  Was Stephen Paddock a "lone-wolf" or was he part of something much bigger?  A patsy, perhaps??  Jump in for this wild ride!!!
 
Visit our sponsor bluechew.com Use the promo code "Brohio" for your FREEEEEE sample
Join us on Patreon: Patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.description:
It's like Madame Lalaurie was made specifically for the Brohio Podcast.  This is a Patreon sponsored episode belonging to Party Pat.  The Lalaurie Mansion is located in New Orleans and holds inside of it one of the darkest tales ever told on the Bayou.  Marie Delphine Lalaurie was a slave owner that committed some of the worst atrocities we've ever heard!!  Join us on this dark adventure.

item.title: Ouija Boards: Talking to Demons
item.description:
We have some very terrifying Ouija Board stories to share with you.  What exactly do you open yourself up to when you play with a Ouija Board?  Many dark entities dwell in the "in-between".  Every time you play with one of these boards, you're welcoming demons into our world and your life.  Let us help guide you through this dark playground.
Support Us: Patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: Stardust Ranch w/ Ranch Owner John Edmonds
item.description:
We are boarding the mothership for this episode!  Rob and Nick fly to one of the most alien infested properties in the world, The StarDust Ranch.  Just outside Phoenix, AZ, the StarDust Ranch is owned by John Edmonds.  John shares an incredible interview with us.   John has spent decades at the ranch dealing with dark entities and forces from beyond our realm that would make most sprint out of town.  The dark forces that saturate this ranch are from out of this world and we are excited to share this episode with you.
Support Us:  Patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: Ruby Ridge: A Government Murder Siege
item.description:
We've got it all in this episode!  Not only are we covering the Siege at Ruby Ridge, we also have a quick interview with Bob Adrian AKA Bill Wilkins from The Conjuring 2!  This was a Patreon sponsored episode from our buddy, Josh.  The Siege at Ruby Ridge is a story of a family attempting to separate themselves from society.  Hidden up in the Idaho mountains, family patriarch, Randy Weaver, made a small sale of 2 sawed off shotguns that resulted in the assassination of his wife and son.  Murdered by the U.S. FBI and ATF.  This a winding story that invokes many emotions!!  Stay until the end for our interview with Patreon sponsor, Josh and our cult hero, Bill Wilkins (Bob Adrian).
Want your own episode??: patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: Craigslist Murders and Disasters
item.description:
If the internet is the wild west, Craigslist is the original frontier.  In this episode, Nick and Rob cover a couple Craigslist murderers and take a look at some Craigslist transactions gone incredibly wrong.  It is the ultimate mess of a show.  Richard Beasley and the Craigslist Cannibal, Armin Meiwes are the heroes of this episode.
 
 
Support Us:  Patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: The South Shields Poltergeist
item.description:
In South Shields England, we investigate a tale of a poltergeist that tortured a family in 2005.  "Marc and Marianne" and their young son dealt with a poltergeist that was completely relentless.  Violent attacks were carried out by this being along with the use of toys as weapons.  The family called in investigators that watched the attacks and full manifestations. 
Support Us!: patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: Tri State Crematory Scandal
item.description:
This is the one story you've never heard.  In this episode we cover how the Tri-State Crematory, ran by the Marsh Family (Tommy and Brent Marsh), let years and possibly thousands of dead bodies accumulate on their property.  The Tri State Crematory was a busy service that many surrounding funeral homes utilized.  The crematory fell on extreme disrepair and Brent Marsh began to stack, pack, hide, discard the bodies anywhere on the property that he could find room, not performing the proper cremation.  Over 400 bodies were recovered by the FBI.  This episode was sponsored by patreon pledger, Kari!!  Kari works at her family's funeral home and answers lots of fun questions.  We also had an interview (AMA style) with a certified mortician!!  What an episode.
Would you like your own episode?!:  Patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: Time Travelers
item.description:
Our advice is to smoke as many marijuanas as possible before this episode. Is is true that our government has a proven track record of time travel that we just don't know about? Many people have come forward and proclaimed to be from many years from now. Are they telling the truth? We have an episode full of time traveling evidence including the infamous John Titor and more recent "Noah". Climb aboard the time machine!!
Support Us: patreon.com/brohiopodcast
Podcast Promo: SpookyToast. Check them out .

item.title: Princess Diana: A Royal Murder
item.description:
The Brohio Podcast doesn't shy from confrontation.  We are confronting the Royal Family in this episode.  Diana, Princess of Wales, was a rockstar.  The world needed Diana and her life was cut all too short.  We discuss her untimely death and the suspicions that surround it.   How many people had a hand in her death/murder?  Was the Royal Family and MI6 behind it all?  We find out in this episode.
Support Us:  Patreon.com/brohiopodcast
Podcast Promo:  Check out "Real Life Ghost Stories"

item.title: The Highgate Vampire
item.description:
We are heading over the pond to investigate one of the most infamous cemeteries in all of Great Britain. The Highgate Cemetery is home to a vampire that terrorized the masses in the 1970’s. Self proclaimed “vampire hunters” David Ferrant and Sean Manchester chased this blood sucking demon to it's final grave. Let us tell you about their adventures. This episode was sponsored by David Forbes!
 
Want your own episode? Patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: The Kunz Family Massacre: Incest, Porn and Murder
item.description:
This is the golden trifecta here: Incest, porn and murder.  Bring on the shark tornadoes and we got a full-fledged NASCAR showdown.  This is the story of a brutal (maybe senseless) murder that shocked the community of Athens Wisconsin like no other.  The siblings: Irene (age 82), Clarence (age 76), Marie (age 72), and Helen (age 70) lived on their sprawling Wisconsin property, with Helen's two sons Randy and Kenneth.  One morning, Kenneth discovered his whole family shot dead and his mother nowhere to be found.... This is where the cousin, uncle, sister, brother lovin' begins.
Would you like to hear your shoutout in the beginnig of an episode?  It's only $1: patreon.com/brohiopodcast
Direct research taken from https://wronglyconvictedgroup.wordpress.com/2015/10/25/chris-jacobs/
Tickets to our LIVE SHOW: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/brohios-twisted-hillbilly-halloween-tickets-48215715503

item.title: The Ghosts of Alcatraz
item.description:
We are traveling to the San Fransico Bay for the prison of all prisons.  We talk about some of the hardened criminals that passed through the bars of Alcatraz.  We also touch on the tortured souls that are still there, trapped between the steel and concrete fortress.  Al Capone would be so proud of us.
Support Us:  Patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: The Battle of Los Angeles: U.S. UFO Government Cover-up
item.description:
At a time in American History where tensions could not be any higher, an unknown aircraft descended over Los Angeles.  Over 2,000 rounds of heavy artillery were fired at the UFO that damaged the aircraft in no way.  In the days following, the government blamed weather balloons, "war nerves", commercial flights piloted by Japan and many other things.  The different branches of our government contained to trip over the others story and no clear answer was given.  This was the first major UFO cover-up in American History and the bros of Brohio are happy to share this story.
Patreon episode sponsored by: Dustin Collins
 
Support Us: patreon.com/brohiopodcast
Use the promo code: "Brohio10" at ridgewallet.com to buy an amazing wallet.

item.title: The Demon Of Brownsville Road
item.description:
This is one of the most well documented demonic infestations on record in the entire world.  Bob Cranmer and his family moved into the home of their dreams only to find out the horrors that hid inside.  A bloody Native American massacre and the second floor used as an abortion clinic, the darkness and evil the home holds is unimaginable.  We could not recommend the book enough!!!  Check it out in the link below!!
Support Us:  Patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: Ep #66 TalHotBlond: The Ultimate Catfish Murder
item.description:
Prepare yourselves for the most fun you'll have all week.  This is the story about the online, whirling love story of MarineSniper1 and TalHotBlond.  We are very familiar with the fact that people often times portray themselves as someone they are not while online, we've all done it.  This murderous story takes the online game of Catfishing to an all new high!!  Prepare for the story of Thomas Montgomery (46) and his online teenage affair.
Support Us!:  Patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: Ep #65 Unit 731
item.description:
A human experiment operation so secretive, many people have never heard of it????  Maybe it's the fact that the findings in these experiments were so coveted by the U.S. Government, the facts were all buried, never to be heard by the general public.  The atrocities committed at UNIT 731 are beyond fathomable. People, or "Logs", as they were called, were subjected to absolute torture for the betterment of Japanese science.  To this day, the Japanese government won't admit to the unspeakable acts that were inflicted on these people!
 
Support us and get access to premium content:  Patreon.com/brohiopodcast

A human experiment operation so secretive, many people have never heard of it????  Maybe it's the fact that the findings in these experiments were so coveted by the U.S. Government, the facts were all buried, never to be heard by the general public.  The atrocities committed at UNIT 731 are beyond fathomable. People, or "Logs", as they were called, were subjected to absolute torture for the betterment of Japanese science.  To this day, the Japanese government won't admit to the unspeakable acts that were inflicted on these people!
 
Support us and get access to premium content:  Patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: Ep #63: MH370: Malaysia Airlines Flight 370
item.description:
You have lost your car keys, you have lost your dog, hell..... you might have lost your kids before.  But, have you ever lost an entire fuckin' airplane?  That's what Nick and Rob discuss in this patreon sponsored episode.  Many conspiracies surround the event of missing MH370.  A Boeing 777 took it's final depature from Kuala Lumpur in Malaysia, never to be seen again.  Listen as we breakdown what happened to this ghost plane.
Special thanks to Anna Woodruff for sponsoring this episode!!
If you'd like YOUR OWN episode check out:  Patreon.com/brohiopodcast
Research Credit:  Stacey A. AKA Mrs. Nickalicious

item.title: Ep #62 Near Death and Reincarnation Experiences
item.description:
This week, we explore the possibilities that when we die on this earth, there is more in store for us in the afterlife.  Do we become ghosts, do we come back?  We explore the truth behind heaven, hell and what they might be like.  Also, we bring you some stories from people that claim to have been to the otherside and they explain what they saw.
 
Support Us:  Patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: Ep #61 Weis Markets Massacre
item.description:
Thank you to Sarah for sponsoring this episode via Patreon!!  In this episode we cover a little-known massacre that occurred near Dallas, Pennsylvania.  Our subject, Randy Stair, was a YouTube vlogger whom couldn’t handle the pressures of running an unsuccessful YouTube channel.  He eventually reaches such a debilitating mental state that he started to speak to fictional cartoon characters in his head.  He pledged his life to them and promised to be with them in the afterlife.  This episode is absolutely nuts and you’ll love it.
***ADDED A DAY LATER, AN INTERVIEW WITH THE LONE SURVIVOR FROM THE INCIDENT, KRISTAN NEWELL.***
 
Support us and sponsor YOUR own episode:  www.patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: Ep #60 The Sallie House
item.description:
It's time to get spoopy!!  This could easily be one of the most haunted houses in America.  Late one night near the turn of the century (1900), a little girl named Sallie was rushed to the front door of the town doctor, Charles Finney.  She was immediately diagnosed with appendicitis and Doctor Finney started surgery that instant! Little Sallie died on the table with little to zero anesthesia.  The moment she passed, she believed she was being tortured by the doctor. The home still stands and one couple claims the home is haunted by vicious demons. They have the testimony to back it up!!  Join us on this paranormal adventure.
 
Support us:  patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: Ep #59 Lucid Dreams and Nightmares
item.description:
Have you ever been in a dream and had complete control over the dream?  You could, fly, run, swim, fuck.... all the awesome stuff you do in a dream?!!!  This is a product of lucid dreaming.  On the other end of the spectrum is lucid nightmares, they are just as terrifying as they sound.  We have some terrifying stories to share and an interview with an expert in lucid dreaming!!  His name is Jared Chiang and you can find his incredible work below!!

item.title: Ep #57 The Kennedy Curse
item.description:
One of the most storied families in the history of the USA are the Kennedys.  You may be familiar with the death of JFK, but there are many other deaths and misfortunes associated with this family that lead to the belief that they're cursed.  The patriarch, Joseph Kennedy Sr, was a sex addict that was deeply rooted in the organized crime mafias in Chicago during the early 1900's. His thirst for political greatness guided his decisions he made about his family. This includes: hiding from the public a daughter that he sought a lobotomy for.  She was exiled from the family, never to be seen or heard from after the damage from the surgery was done.
Support Us:  Patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: Ep #56 Appalachian Nightmares
item.description:
This was a patreon sponsored episode from Matt Hursh! In this episode, we cover the mysterious beasts that hide in the Appalachian mountain range of the USA. Not only do we cover these monsters, we also share some tales of paranormal experiences that plague the mountains. In Greenbrier County, a murder unfolded where the only time in history, the testimony of a ghost helped to convict a murderer. This episode is all over the place and WE KNOW YOU WILL LOVE IT!
Support Us: patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: Ep #55 Scott Peterson: The Murder of Laci Peterson
item.description:
The Peterson's were your All-American couple.  They lived a quiet life in California and were about to finally welcome the birth of a baby boy after nearly 5 years of marriage. Things took a nasty turn when Scott returned home from fishing on Christmas Eve 2002. Laci was missing and Scott was the main suspect. A mistress came forward claiming to have been romantic with Scott in the leading months. He told the mistress he was a grieving widower. Scott was convicted for the murders of his wife and unborn child with no physical evidence. Join us as we explore all the theories of this case .
Support us: patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: Ep #53 The Haunting in Connecticut
item.description:
This episode is centered around the true story investigated by Ed and Lorraine Warren. In the early 80's Al, Carmen, Phillip and Bradley found their family in a new home. The Snedekers were looking for a home closer to the hospital where their son, Phillip, was being treated for cancer. They found a home that fit their needs perfectly, but shortly thereafter moving in they discovered that the home was formally used for funeral services. Many violent acts were carried out against the family by various demons in the home. There were also instances of several rapes that occurred against the family members by the demons. Then the "A" Team was called in..... Ed and Lorraine Warren.
Support us: patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: Ep #52 RMS Titanic, The Truth
item.description:
After hitting some heavy research, it is the belief of the Bros that the sinking of the Titanic was no accident. The luxury oceanliner was built to never fail (unsinkable), led by one of the most distinguished captains to ever sail the seas. Many busy hands were moving when this accident occurred and there is no surprise that a ton of greed was potentially involved. Listen to the information we have and draw your own conclusions. 
Support us: patreon.com/brohiopodcast

The luxury oceanliner was built to never fail (unsinkable), led by one of the most distinguished captains to ever sail the seas. Many busy hands were moving when this accident occurred and there is no surprise that a ton of greed was potentially involved. Listen to the information we have and draw your own conclusions. 
Support us: patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: Ep #51 The Disappearence Of Madeleine McCann
item.description:
While on holiday in Portugal, the McCann family was faced with the ultimate devastation of a parent, the abduction of their child. As time went on, authorities began to see Gerry and Kate McCann as the prime suspects in this case. Did the parents overdose their child while trying to force her to sleep? Let's find out in this new episode.
Support us: patreon.com/brohiopodcast
Research Credit: Courtney C.

item.title: Ep #50 Bohemian Grove
item.description:
Nestled deep in the California redwoods is a campground and luxury resort where the most powerful men in the world all meet for 3 weeks out of the year.  There are eyewitness and victim accounts of viscous sexual abuse and child sacrifice. We explore what really happens in those woods and what things they talk about there. From the 40ft tall owl to the cremation of character ceremony, we think it is all part of something deeper and the government DOES NOT want us to know the truth .
Support us: patreon.com/brohiopodcast

item.title: Ep #49 Portal To Hell: Stull Cemetery
item.description: We are giving it up to Satan on this one. Nestled in the corn, somewhere in Kansas, is said to be a cemetery so entrenched in darkness that the devil himself uses it to pass back and forth between earth and hell. Stull, Kansas is home to Stull Cemetery and a twisting tale of decades of death, despair and sadness. Welcome to: The Portal To Hell .

item.title: Ep #48 Disney Darkness
item.description:
You've grown up on the timeless classics, just like us, but did you know there is a dark, checkered history behind the Disney Universe.  In this episode, we cover all things that are dark when it comes to the mouse! Dozens of people have died in the park, hauntings in Disney, the hidden agenda mind control that Disney is secretly enforcing. There is no end to the stories . We also discuss modern day classics and how they are all connected and used to break your mind down .

item.title: Ep #47 "Dingos Ate My Baby!" The Azaria Chamberlain Story
item.description:
This is a patreon sponsored episode!  Our friend Kylie chose the Azaria Chamberlain Story as her topic.  This topic took us to the wild land of AUSTRALIA!!!!!  The Chamberlain family was vacationing at Ayers Rock in the 1980's.  The family was settlinging in for the night whe, Mother--Lindy Chamberlain, heard her baby crying 30ft away in their tent.  When she arrived to the tent, she allagedly observed a dingo running away with her baby.  The baby was never found, but Lindy was sentenced to life in prison for murder!!  A search warrant showed a tremendous amount of fetal blood in the family vehicle.  The police called it a sacraficial murder for their 7th Day Adventist beliefs.  This episode was a research monster and we are sure you'll enjoy this true crime massacre.
Would you like to choose your own topic?!  Here's how.
Support us!!: Patreon.com/brohiopodcast
In our new patreon, Nick's wife, Stacey, joins us.

item.title: Ep #46 The Death and Conspiracy Of Adolf Hitler
item.description:
With all the different accounts of how Adolf Hitler died, there are just as many accounts that presume that he lived and lead a peaceful life up in the mountains after WWII. Are there any truths to these conspiracies? Did he go to the moon, did she join a legion of hollow earthers? The Bros unravel this mystery. He also had a baby dick and we tell you all about that. 
Promos! Monsters Among Us and The Witching Hour.

item.title: Ep #44 National Park Disappearences
item.description:
There are literally, thousands of unsolved disappearences that have occurred in our national parks.The strange things about these occurrences....it seems like the National Parks Service is doing everything within their power to cover them up. Are we looking at a potential interdimensional being or aliens as the cause? Possibly a killer? Why are these people vanishing into thin air!? The Bros are on the case! This episode is an ode to David Paulines and Missing 411.

item.title: Ep #43 Attack Of The Little Green Men
item.description: It was a smoldering summer in 1955 in Kelly, Kentucky, near Hopkinsville and Fort Campbell Air Force Base. On the fateful night in question, the Sutton Family was besieged by a group of 3 foot tall extraterrestrials. The little green men swarmed the property sending Lucky Sutton and family into a bullet filled rage. The aliens didn't respond to being struck by the bullets and refused to leave. The police and military got involved and it is believed they blew this investigation. IN THIS EPISODE, WE INTERVIEW THE DAUGHTER OF LUCKY SUTTON, GERALDINE SUTTON STITH. You can check out the books she's authored, The Kelly Green Men and The Alien Legacy!!!

item.title: Ep #42 The Cecil Hotel "The Suicide Hotel"
item.description:
At the Cecil Hotel, decades upon decades of strange occurrences continue to plague this infamous location. A suicide and murder hotspot, it's home to many mysteries that will never be explained.  It was then home to the Night Stalker serial killer amongst other murderous monsters.  The inspiration behind a season of American Horror Story.  The most familiar case is the odd circumstances surrounding the death of Elisa Lam. Caught on CCTV having a possible psychotropic breakdown and ultimately found dead in the hotel's water tank.  Government, demons? We break it all down for you this episode. 
Support us: www.patreon.com/Threadless
Elevator CCTV: https://youtu.be/3TjVBpyTeZM
This episode was sponsered by our Patreon Subscribers, Julie Ho! Thanks, Julie .
Research credit to the majestic Courtney C. And Julie C.

item.title: Ep #40 Circleville Letters Mystery
item.description: In 1976, Circleville, a small town near Columbus Ohio was paralyzed by a mysterious person sending anonymous letters to many people in the town. One of those to receive a letter was Mary Gillespie. In the letter, the writer demanded she STOP the affair she was having with the school superintendent .The letters never stopped coming and ultimately caused a death, a possibly innocent man to be incarcerated for 10 years and a town pushed to the brink of no return. Join us as we cover one of biggest unexplained mysteries in modern America.

item.title: Ep #39 Doppelgangers
item.description:
This episode, the Bros dig into the world of Doppelgangers. With over 7.6 billion people living in the world today, it's almost guaranteed there is someone out there that looks completely identical to you. What about the entity from another realm that is you, but is more of a paranormal being? What about body doubles? We check out the truth behind Adolf Hitler, Avril Lavigne, Paul McCartney, Emimem having dopplegangers.

item.title: Ep #38 Robert Pickton
item.description:
Head on down to the farm with us as we tear into Canada's most prolific serial killer, Robert Pickton (Pork Chop Rob). A killing spree that ultimately accounted for the death of 49 prostitutes. Rob was the nastiest of the nasty and we will tell you why .This topic was selected by our patreon subscriber, Kevin.  He joined us for the episode and we had a butt chugging good time. You can join the $50 club on our patreon as well .We'd love to have you on the show with us .
Research Credit: Courtney C. and Julie C.  
Patreon.com/brohiopodcast
PROMOS: MOMS AND MURDER AND GHOST IN THE BURBS. check them out!

item.title: Ep #37 Denver International Airport Conspiracy
item.description:
Many things are left to question about the Denver International Airport.  Nazi runways, Illuminati, Free Masons, Underground bunkers, sonic pressure, EMPs, government coverups, gargoyles, a horse statue with the most beautiful nutsack you've ever seen.  Nick and Rob dig into pandoras box and open up what is hiding at DIA.  Men in tuxedos and gasmasks....yeah.  It is all here.
Wanna help us buy a new microphone? Click for PATREON
One time donation??  paypal.me/Brohiopodcast

item.title: Ep #36 Demonic Possession
item.description:
This is one of our scariest episodes to date! A certain audio clip will make your hair STAND ON END and question all of the faith in your soul. In this episode we cover the different stages of demonic possession, how they happen, how to stop them and the most notorious cases in the world. This episode is sure to rattle you and we are happy to present it to you . 
Research Credit: Julie C. and Courtney C.  
Promos: ShambleFest and Two Girls One Ghost

item.title: Ep #35 Andrei Chikatilo
item.description:
The Butcher of Rostov, himself! We travel over the ocean in this one and unlock the horrors behind one of the most prolific serial killers in the world. Andrei was born during one of the worst times to be alive in Ukraine/USSR. Many events in the life of Andrei shaped him into the monster he would grow to be. This was an episode topic chosen by one of our faithful Patreon subscribers. 
Research Credit: Julie C.. Courtney C. had the Spanish butt flu. Feel better, girl.

item.title: Ep #34 Montauk Project
item.description:
In one of the most intriguing conspiracies we've ever covered, we dive into the world below the Montauk Air Force Base. In the 1940's the USS Eldridge was being tested for invisibility. This project was known as the Philadelphia Experiment. Mean while, in 1983, a time travel experiment at Camp Hero in Montauk, NY was beginning to change the pages of history. A collision in time occurred launching shipmates from the 1940's USS Eldridge to the very front door of the Montauk Air Force Base in 1983. Join us as we investigate the alleged true story and inspiration behind STRANGER THINGS.
RESEARCH CREDIT: Julie C. and Courtney C.

item.title: Ep #33 Borley Rectory: The Most Haunted Place in England
item.description:
A house with so many dark stories hidden inside it is called.the most haunted place in England.  Borley Rectory contains stories of monks and nuns trying to elope, ending in executions and sightings of carriages captained by headless men. Join us on this paranormal adventure. 
Research credit: BMF Courtney C.

item.title: Ep #32 The Blood Countess: Elizabeth Bathory
item.description: The Bros are back after a Holiday Hiatus. She's known in the Guinness Book of World Records as the most murderous woman in the history of the world. In this episode we dig into the Blood Countess: Elizabeth Bathory. She tortured her servants in ways that are completely unspeakable. Was she a product of a royal kingdom that wished to see her dead for debts the king owed her? Find out in this episode.

item.title: Ep #31 Trans Allegheny Lunatic Asylum
item.description:
A place so dark, few to date even enter after all these years. The Trans Allegheny Lunatic Asylum was a dumping ground for people suffering from many conditions.  This day, while no longer in business, it is still overran with the tortured souls that haven't moved on. 
 
Research Credit: Julie C. and Courtney C.

item.title: Ep #30 Villisca Axe Murders
item.description:
It was a dark cloud that settled over the small town in middle America.  Viscilla, Iowa was known to be a friendly, small place where no face was a stranger. That dark cloud was a precursor of an unsolved murder that saw 6 children and 2 adults bludgeoned to death in their sleep by an unknown assailant(s). Flash forward to modern day Villisca and this home where the axe murders occurred is a paranormal hotspot.  The cries of the children can still be heard to this day.
Research Credit: Courtney C.

item.title: Ep #29 Aileen Wuornos
item.description:
Brohio explores the life and times of prostitute/serial killer, Aileen Wuornos. Wuornos was doomed from the very beginning. Abandoned by her mother at age 4, she was sexually abused all the way through her teenage years where she turned to a life of hookin’. She went on to murder 7 men in cold blood, eventually landing on death row. She was executed via lethal injection. Come along on this magical journey with us.
Research Credit: The Lovely Courtney C. Check out her travel blog crdoesstuff.com and her IG:@sporadictravelers

item.title: Ep #28 Men In Black
item.description:
Since the 1950's, there has been accounts of real Men In Black paying visists to people that actively investigate UFOs and those that have seen UFOs. The ultimate goal of these men is to silence the voice of these people and keep the information about UFOs to an absolute minimum. We explore the first hand accounts of these people. Including the experiences of Dan Akyroyd and Albert Bender.
 
Research Credit: Julie C.

item.title: Ep #27 Skinwalker Ranch
item.description:
A geographic anomaly? A geographic oddity? Native Americans have told stories of this doomed ranch for generations. It has claimed many lives and continues to be monitored by government research agencies to this day.  The Skinwalker Ranch in Utah is home to UFOs, Bigfoot humanoid creatures, time traveling Indians, mutant wolves and much more. It's truths are tightly wooven behind chain fences and maximum security guards. 
 
Research Credit: Courtney C.
Patreon.com/brohiopodcast Help us buy a new microphone.

item.title: Ep #26 Medical Disasters
item.description:
This episode is a potpourri of medical disasters that our wonderful research assistants dug up. Some terrible, some laughable. We did record this episode 3,000 miles away from one another, so this was an editing nightmare. Cut us some slack if it sounds like a bucket of smashed ass. 
 
All research Credit goes to the wonderful Courtney and Julie!

item.title: Ep #25 Nightmare Death Syndrome
item.description:
You've heard the old adage, "nothing good happens after midnight". Well, we are here to help confirm that. Nightmare Death Syndrome, Nocturnal Death Syndrome, Suddens Adult Death Syndrome, Sudden Unexpected Death Syndrome are the inspiration behind Nightmare On Elm Street.  One incident in the 1980's saw dozens of Laotion refugees die in their sleep unexpectedly. Is it possible to die in your nightmare and life simultaneously? You betcha!
Research Credit: Courtney C. (AKA BrohioCourt, AKA Baddest MF Ever)
Wanna give us a dollar? PayPal: Brohiopodcast@gmail.com patreon.com/brohiopodcast
Thank you for the listener stories!

item.title: **BONUS** Live Episode Lucky Star Brewery
item.description: This Bonus Episode was recorded live at the Lucky Star Brewery in Miamisburg, OH. This was our first live show and we couldn't have had more fun. We met many awesome fans and covered some great cases. We also had an interview with Paranormal Investigator, Matt Neubauer from Fairfield Paranormal. We dug into many Dayton based hauntings and a little bit of true crime. We also found out the Brewery was haunted and we spoke to several employees concerning these occurrences.

item.title: Ep #24 Halloween Murders and Mayhem
item.description:
Halloween is the day for children to parade the neighborhoods begging for candy.... It's also one of the most hexed days of the year. Many instances of brutal murders, rapes and absolute mayhem have been committed on this dark day. In this new episode, we cover the most gruesome murders and Halloween disasters the world has to offer. This is a dark, disturbing episode. Partake at your own risk. We wish no disrespect to the victims of these crimes. 
Research Credits: Courtney C. and Julie C.

Many instances of brutal murders, rapes and absolute mayhem have been committed on this dark day. In this new episode, we cover the most gruesome murders and Halloween disasters the world has to offer. This is a dark, disturbing episode. Partake at your own risk. We wish no disrespect to the victims of these crimes. 
Research Credits: Courtney C. and Julie C.

item.title: Ep #23 Stalkers
item.description:
Have you been the center of a relentless obsession from an unwanted person? Maybe a co-worker that refuses to take a hint and turns to becoming a complete creep. We dig into the minds of stalkers during this episode. What types of stalkers are out there. We also give you some of the most unbelievable stalker stories you've ever heard. We also make fun of stalkers. Can't have Brohio without your elementary dose of humor. 
 All research for this episode performed by the always lovely, Courtney C.

item.title: Ep #22 Japanese Suicide Forest
item.description:
Tucked beneath the shadows of Mount Fuji is a forest so consumed with darkness and despair, it produces thousands of suicides every decade.  The Aokigahara Forest, or The Japanese Suicide Forest, is an unfortunate ending spot in life for many troubled souls. It is said to be haunted by many yureis that haven't crossed over and plan to haunt the forest forever. Nick and Rob will attempt to bring light to an incredibly dark subject. Your life is indeed a wonderful gift and there are many outlets out there if you feel pushed to the limit.

item.title: Ep #20 Gypsy Rose Case
item.description:
Dee Dee Blancharde spent her daughter's entire life  making her believe she was deathly ill. She convinced doctors to treat her daughter, Gypsy, for sleep apnea, leukemia, muscular dystrophy and list of other ailments too long to write.  Gypsy met an internet boyfriend whom she convinced to kill her mother, liberating her from the years of abuse. Gypsy is now serving 10 years in prison and the fate of her mother's killer hangs in the balance. 
THANK YOU TO OUR PERFECT RESEARCH ASSISTANT: COURTNEY C.

item.title: Ep #19 Indiana Hell House
item.description:
In this episode, we cover the infamous home from Gary, Indiana that was said to contain the portal to hell. 3 children, a mother and a grandmother experienced CONFIRMED demon activity in the home that medical, law enforcement and government officials all went on record as a witness to. A 7 year old boy walked backwards up a wall in one occasion, in the presence of a registered nurse. People that investigated were seemingly cursed and unexplained horrors followed them. 
Thanks, again, to the lovely Courtney C. for her research!
Official Child Protective Services Report
Indy Star Article

item.title: Ep #18 Salem Witch Trials
item.description:
In the late 1600's an entire village was caught in a display of mass hysteria. Hundreds of people were arrested for practicing witchcraft without a shred of evidence. Some were brutally murdered over these accusations. This episode covers those gruesome events. We also have a live, in studio guest from the United States Air Force. Ron is Phoenix Raven. We also hit on the creepy residual hauntings. 
Research assistance provided by the lovely, Courtney C.

item.title: Ep #17 Alien Abductions
item.description:
Have you ever wondered what type of god awful things happen to a person when they're abducted by aliens? Aliens are creating a master race to take over the world by harvesting OUR sperm and eggs. We also have our first Brohio interview with Michael Menkin. Michael is the inventor of the Thought Screen Helmet. A helmet that has effectively thwarted many alien abductions. Michael is very well versed in Abductions and provided tremendous content during his interview. 
Michael's website: Stop Alien Abductions

item.title: Ep #15 Shadow People
item.description:
It is the middle of the night. Your eyes crack open. You see a completely blacked out man in a hat lurking at the foot of your bed. Your body is completely locked up. You can't speak. You're paralyzed. This episode covers the terror of Shadow People. What are they? How do you stop or get rid of them?

item.description:
Sometime in the 1940's, a tale emerged from Mother Russia. A tale of political prisoners being locked in a chamber for the greater good of science. This was called The Russian Sleep Experiment. True, false, creepypasta? Either way, the horrors told in this episode will make your skin crawl.

item.title: Ep #6 Part 1 JonBenét Ramsey
item.description: One of the most prolific murders in American History rocked the world in 1996. Many questions remain. The Bros give you their spin on what they think happened to JonBenet Ramsey. A child died, but was it at the hands of a child? Jon Ramsey, Patsy Ramsey and Burke are all prime players in this debacle.

item.title: Ep #5 911 Calls and Creepy Sounds
item.description: This topic was voted to the top by the Brohio Nation.  We are covering 911 phone calls and creepy, chilling sounds.  Monkeys ripping people’s faces off, exorcisms, weeping serial killers. Brohio covers it all this episode

item.title: Ep #4 Slender Man
item.description: Episode #4 and the mysterious, Slender Man. Is he real, fake, myth, legend, demon? The Bros of Brohio break it down. We also dive into the attempted murder of a 12 year old girl by 2 of Slender Man’s “proxies".

item.title: Ep #3 Nuclear Armageddon
item.description: What is the possibility of a global nuclear war? How close are we to turning the planet into a desolate wasteland? The Bros.tell you the gut wrenching facts about what to expect during a modern-day nuclear explosion. Rob also stepped in some shat at work this week and we discussed that.

item.title: Ep #2 2 of 2. BLACK EYED CHILDREN
item.description: On part 2 of this split episode, we tell you about Black Eyed Children. Imagine waking up to a loud banging in the middle of the night at the front door.  You open the door to 2 pale children with eyes as dark and empty as the world’s deepest cave. You are instantly too sick to move. Let the Bros of Brohio save you from this nightmare.

item.title: Ep #2 1 of 2 Haunted Athens Ohio
item.description: The Bros are bringing you part 1 of 2 of an episode where we investigate the vicious hauntings in Athens Ohio.  We will talk about an insane asylum that performed dozens of lobotomies everyday. Part 2 we will blow the lid off the little known Black Eyed Children and why you should never let them in your house.

item.title: Ep #1 Aliens at Wright Patterson
item.description: Come join us on a magical audio adventure as the Bros take you deep inside the Wright Patterson Air Force Base and the secrets it contains. There is what the government tells us, and there is what really happened. Aliens? Flying Saucer? Let’s discuss.
